attributes.action: Avoid rejection of help for the least unwell people
attributes.additional_details: I have had personal experiences with mental health services and I can say that some of them have not been a great experience at all. My mum has tried reaching out for help because she wasn’t feeling at her best and thought she needed some help. But because she wasn’t in a crisis and because she didn’t meet the criteria of needing help, she was turned away
attributes.background: Personally, I would like the government or Parliament to consider absolutely everybody who reaches out for mental health support whether in a crisis or not. And whether they meet the needs of receiving help or not

rejection.details:
You can read more about accessing NHS mental health services on the webpage below:

https://www.nhs.uk/using-the-nhs/nhs-services/mental-health-services/how-to-access-mental-health-services/
